tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_genre_sales (
    genre_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    genre_name VARCHAR(50),
    songs_count INT,
    revenue DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE songs (
    song_id INT,
    song_name VARCHAR(100),
    genre_id INT,
    artist_name VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE tracks (
    track_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    track_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    artist_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    album_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    release_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    track_id INT REFERENCES tracks(track_id),
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    customer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE revenue (
    revenue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    total_revenue DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    period_start DATE,
    period_end DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Genre (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255))
CREATE TABLE Artist (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), genre_id INT)
CREATE TABLE Album (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), release_date DATE, artist_id INT)
CREATE TABLE Song (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255), duration INT, album_id INT)
CREATE TABLE Revenue (id INT PRIMARY KEY, amount DECIMAL(10, 2), date DATE, genre_id INT)
